projects.title: DEFIL
projects.description: DeFil is a chrome extension used to classify defamatory sentences on Twitter. The classification process uses the help of machine learning models, this project is written using the Python and JavaScript programming languages.

projects.title: DOTCOW
projects.description: Dotcow is an expert system for diagnosing cattle disease based on a website. This expert system uses a forward chaining algorithm for its inference engine, while the programming language used in developing this system uses ReactJS for the front-end, nodeJS and Express for the back-end and MySQL for the database.

projects.title: MONU
projects.description: MONU (Monitoring Nutrition) is an android application that is used to monitor a user's nutritional status, this application was developed using the Kotlin programming language and SQLlite for its local database.
